user_query: I'm planning a surprise anniversary party for my parents. Can you help me find a list of available rich menus for the party? Also, retrieve the balance of my sms77io account. Additionally, could you fetch the content of a specific message with the message ID '54321'?

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of available rich menus for the anniversary party.
Retrieve the balance of the sms77io account.
Fetch the content of the message with the message ID '54321'.
